content: main body stockinette section knit with mc row 1 rs *kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm repeat from * 3 more times row 2 ws *p until the end of the row sm as you come to them repeat row 1 & 2 3 more times for a total of 8 row 32 sts increased slip_stitch section knit with cc row 1 rs *kfb sl1pwyib k1 repeat between until 1 st before marker kfb sm repeat from * until the end of row 8 sts increased row 2 ws *p2 sl1pwyif k1 repeat between until 2 sts before marker p2 sm repeat from * until the end of row continue working in this manner until you are comfortable with joining in the round as mentioned above we suggest that you switch to working in the round at the beginning of a stockinette section once you ve joined be sure to begin following main body instructions on page 4 you will work a total of 31 stockinette and slip_stitch section repeats and then work the slip_stitch section one more time before moving on to the picot border when finishing you will need to sew the seam from the point you joined in the round to center © sonder yarn co 2023 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only fiori | page 4 abbreviations bobble bind-off bor beginning of round co cast-on cc contrast colour dpns double pointed needles k knit kfb knit into the front then into the back of the stitch increase k2togtbl knit two stitches together through the back loop decrease mc main colour p purl pfb purl into the front then into the back of the stitch increase pm place marker rs right side sl1pwyib slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in back sl1pwyif slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in front sm slip marker st s stitch es ws wrong side © sonder yarn co 2023 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only
